title: #ICYMI | Toyota GR Supra GT4 ready for 2020, SA's electric car future - Top motoring stories of the day
text:
Toyota unleashed a 320kW race-ready version of the GR Supra called the GT4, purpose built for track racing only.

Wheels24 correspondent Charlen Raymond took the new Honda Ballade for a spin to see if its sedan offering is on par with the likes of the Corolla and Mazda 3.



In case you missed it

Being involved in an accident is not a good situation to be in, even more so when your car is written off in the process. There is an interesting article that shows you what happens when your car is effectively a 'write off'.

SEE | Here's why Toyota and other automakers have a rugby team

Toyota's influence goes beyond automotion and in Japan, they have a rugby team. Lance Branquinho takes a look at some of the other automakers that have a rugby team.

October is Transport month and we took part in an electric road trip across South Africa. We list 10 important factors regarding electric mobility.

Click on the links below to read the full article:
description: Toyota will unleash a race-ready version of the GR Supra GT4 next year, and here's what happens when your car is written off in a crash. Your top motoring stories of the day.
